mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.groupnum AS "groupnum", a.chang AS "chang", a.p1 AS "peopleNote.id", a.score1 AS "score1", a.matchid as "matchid", a.btype as "btype", a.type as "type", b.name as "peopleNote.name"
left join bisai_people_note b on a.p1 = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_people_group( groupnum, chang, p1, score1, matchid, btype, type ) VALUES ( #{groupnum}, #{chang}, #{peopleNote.id}, #{score1}, #{matchid}, #{btype}, #{type} )
mapper.delete: delete from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{matchid} and btype=#{btype}
